snippet: Wall Street’s losses, which continued into a second week, were modest compared with stocks in France and Germany and the Russian ruble.
abstract: Dropping oil prices drive stock market down, extending losses into second week.
lead_paragraph: Wall Street’s losses, which continued into a second week, were modest compared with stocks in France and Germany and the Russian ruble.

headline.main: Oil Still Falling, and So Are the Markets
headline.print_headline: Oil Still Falling, and So Are the Markets
